Digital Customer Experience

The module will allow you to explore trends and challenges of the dynamic nature of digital customer behaviour to enable marketers to meet customer expectations within the digital marketing context. You will learn how digital channels can be managed to deliver a valued customer experience.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of the complex and dynamic nature of global consumer and customer behaviour and the impact on customer experience in a digital marketplace. [Knowledge & Understanding, Learning]

+  Evaluate the appropriateness of customer experience models and frameworks in shaping future CX strategies to engage and enhance customer experiences. [Analysis, Enquiry]

+  Evaluate the key influences on digital customer experience at all stages of the customer journey when formulating CX strategies. [Problem Solving, Analysis]

+  Analyse and evaluate a range of analytics business data and reflect on its use for evidencebased decision-making to enhance digital customer experience. [Analysis, Problem Solving, Application, Reflection]
